title: No Hextech Crafting Rewards
body: For some reason I haven't been able to get any crafting rewards from matchs for the past two months despite doing well and winning. I haven't been punished for any negative behavior (aside from dodging in draft occasionally) and my profile says I'm elligiable for at least two crates so I don't know why I haven't gotten crate or key. Riot, why you do dis to me? How am I supposed to get Final Boss Veigar if you won't let me exploit your system? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you've already earn chests on most of the champions you frequently play this season. Since you can only earn one chest per champion each season, you'll want to widen your pool of champs you're earning S-grades on in order to earn more chests.

You can find our complete breakdown of the Hextech Crafting system in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) Let me know if you have any questions.
